charinfo.name: Aburame Shino
charinfo.description: A Genin from Team 8, Shino is the successor of the Aburame clan, and a very reserved and tactical fighter. Using the bugs that live inside his body, Shino is able to leech the chakra off his enemies, or protect his entire team.

abilities.name: Chakra Leech
abilities.description: Shino directs his chakra draining bugs to attack one enemy dealing 20 affliction damage and steals 1 random chakra.

abilities.name: Female Bug
abilities.description: Shino directs one of his female bugs to attach itself to one enemy. For 4 turns, new non-affliction damage that enemy deals is reduced by 5 points. During this time, 'Chakra Leech' will deal 5 additional damage to them. These effects stack.

abilities.name: Bug Wall
abilities.description: Shino sends millions of bugs to create a wall around his team, making them gain 20 points of destructible defense.

abilities.name: Shino Hide
abilities.description: This skill makes Aburame Shino invulnerable for 1 turn.
